mapper.select: SELECT vm.sku,v.uid vendorUid FROM omc.dbo.Vendor_Mapping vm INNER JOIN mmc.product.family fa ON vm.ProductID = fa.productId INNER JOIN mmc.product.finish f ON vm.Finish = f.finish INNER JOIN mmc.dbo.Manufacturer m ON m.Name = vm.Manufacturer INNER JOIN mmc.product.product p ON p.finishId = f.id AND p.familyId = fa.id INNER JOIN omc.dbo.vendor v ON vm.Vendor = v.vendorid WHERE v.uid = #{vendorUid} AND p.statusId = 6
